name: Fifi Adventure
description:
Fifi goes on an adventure and cleans up the world.

Clean up the maximum amount of trash and Fifi may reward you at the end!!!

2 gamepads or keyboard can be used.

Gamepad:

Left analog stick and A + B

Keyboard:

WSAD for doggo controls

Arrow keys for human controls.

Credits

Art and visuals by Tara Heather Kelly (Procreate)

Programming, music, audio design by MK (Construct 3, Renoise 3)
